name: OOX: Create Vending Machine
title: Create Vending Machine
description: Create a vending machine to sell multiple NFTs at a fixed price. Buyers can mint NFTs directly from your machine.

inputs.name: Price
inputs.description: Price per NFT in the accepted payment token.

inputs.name: Payment Token
inputs.description: Accepted payment token identifier (EGLD for eGold, or ESDT token identifier).

inputs.name: Name
inputs.description: Name of the vending machine (encoded as bytes).

inputs.name: NFTs
inputs.description: NFTs to add to the vending machine.
